name: 傲皇忆剑诀
publisher: 流一心娱乐游戏集团总部
description: In the continents of disputes among nations, countries have organized competitions. You can recruit all kinds of martial arts to help you win the competitions in the future. You can also establish relationships with these generals, such as husband and wife, brothers and so on. The abilities and attributes of these generals are random.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5GHz + Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 280 series or higher DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes:
